beezone1.app_home_content: This App provides a variety of tools to enable you to take a break from a racing, stressful mind and come back to calmness and focus.
beezone1.meditation_introduction:
The process of meditation teaches us the art of connecting with our consciousness and changing it from one based on a physical reality to one that is non-physical ‚Äì a spiritual reality.
As you make your way through this process you will naturally go through a number of steps to reach a state of meditation. Your experience at each step will be beautiful, enriching and empowering, but it is only the final step that is referred to as actual ‚Äòmeditation‚Äô.
beezone1.relaxation_description: Relaxation is about letting go of tension and stress and bringing the mind and body into a state of calm and peace ‚Ä¶
beezone1.concentration_description: Concentration allows me to use my time productively, once I have relaxed: I can focus on the thoughts I choose to have ‚Ä¶
beezone1.contemplation_description: Contemplation is reflecting deeply on myself, my inner world and my values‚Ä¶
beezone1.realisation_description: Realisation is when my understanding and feelings combine and I experience a more profound, more meaningful reality‚Ä¶
beezone1.meditation_description: Meditation is focusing on a thought and remembering my eternal identity, and re-awakening a wonderful state of well-being ‚Ä¶
beezone1.approach_para1: Raja Yoga Meditation is based on a body of knowledge. Through understanding one is able to create a state of spiritual awareness.
beezone1.approach_para2: This art of self-awareness, by learning to use our mind in the right way, enables one to become a master over our own life, and the experiences we have in life.
beezone1.approach_para3: We gently guide and direct our mind in a chosen direction, thinking only peaceful, positive and empowering thoughts, and then go into the experience of them.
beezone1.bkwsu_description: Brahma Kumaris is a worldwide spiritual movement dedicated to personal transformation and world renewal. Founded in India in 1937, Brahma Kumaris has spread to over 110 countries on all continents and has had an extensive impact in many sectors as an international NGO. However, their real commitment is to helping individuals transform their perspective of the world from material to spiritual. It supports the cultivation of a deep collective consciousness of peace and of the individual dignity of each soul. The University offers all its activities free of charge, being funded by voluntary contributions.
beezone1.app_desc2: It can be used by anyone at anytime to Stop ‚Äì Relax ‚Äì Experience ‚Äì Re-Empower.
beezone1.daily_about: A fresh challenge each day to inculcate a virtue into your daily life.
beezone1.mind_gym_heading: Mind Gym has some focusing or relaxation exercises to keep the mind fit and healthy
beezone1.mind_spa_heading: Mind Spa is a collection of meditation audios to relax and unwind. Please select the ones you like from the list and relax‚Ä¶
beezone1.virtue_about: Spin the Virtue Wheel and Meditate on your personal virtue of the day
beezone1.mc_about: Select your mood and allow our guided mediations to help shift that mood.
beezone1.mg_about: Here we have some focusing or relaxation exercises to keep the mind fit and healthy.
beezone1.ml_about: Try one of our meditation techniques to help you relax and refocus.
beezone1.ms_about: A variety of meditation audios to relax and unwind.
beezone1.mind_lab_home_content: Try one of our meditation techniques to help you relax and refocus
beezone1.mind_lab_music_content_breathing: Using breath as a means to focus
beezone1.mind_lab_music_desc_om_chant: Expand your consciousness with the eternal sound of the Universe....
beezone1.mind_lab_music_desc_relaxation: Relax the body and mind with this step-by-step commentary
beezone1.mind_lab_music_desc_the_conch: Journey to the depths of your unlimited self
beezone1.mind_lab_music_desc_tibetan_singing: Healing vibrations to releases emotional blockages
beezone1.tc_no_entries: BeeZone Traffic Control is empty and cannot be started
beezone1.favourites_no_favourite_yet: No Favourite yet. Click on the hearts to create one ‚Ä¶
beezone1.daily_explanation: A daily Food for Thought, for a healthy and happy mind. Your Challenge: Contemplate and Apply the days\' virtue into your daily schedule.
beezone1.general_do_not_display_again: Do not display this message again
beezone1.traffic_control_about_description: Create moments throughout the day to pause the traffic of your thoughts and refocus the mind.
beezone1.traffic_control_notification: Traffic control coming up next at %1$d %2$s
beezone1.songadapter_select_one: At least one song needs to be selected
beezone1.help_fragment_length_meditation_sessions: How long are the meditation sessions?
beezone1.help_fragment_kind_of_med: What kind of meditation is Raja Yoga?
beezone1.help_fragment_ry_med_benefits: What are the benefits of Raja Yoga meditation?
beezone1.help_fragment_learn_how_long: How long will it take to learn?
beezone1.help_fragment_why_no_charges: Why don\'t you charge for your product?
beezone1.help_fragment_time_for_med: How do I find time to meditate?
beezone1.help_fragment_med_clothes: What should I wear to meditate?
beezone1.help_fragment_med_sit: How do I sit during meditation?
beezone1.help_fragment_daily_challenge: Daily Challenge: A fresh challenge each day to inculcate a virtue into daily life.
beezone1.help_fragment_virtuescope: Virtuescope: Spin the Virtue Wheel and Meditate on your personal virtue of the day.
beezone1.help_fragment_mood_clinic: Mood Clinic: Select your mood and allow our guided meditations to help shift that mood.
beezone1.help_fragment_mind_gym: Mind Gym: Here we have some focusing or relaxation exercises to keep the mind fit and healthy.
beezone1.help_fragment_mind_lab: Mind Lab: Try one of our mediation techniques to help you relax and refocus.
beezone1.help_fragment_mind_spa: Mind Spa: A variety of meditation audios to relax and unwind.
beezone1.help_fragment_meditation_length_explanat: We have aimed to make each session of meditation on this about 5 minutes long so that it is more practical to incorporate into a busy schedule. If you wish to experiment with longer meditation sessions can be found on http://www.brahmakumaris.org/meditation/experience-meditation .
beezone1.hemp_fragment_target_audience: The app is aimed at people with a busy life who wish to start introducing meditation practices into their routine. It provides some simple tools to allow one to stop, re-empower internally, and then continue with activity having shifted their state of mind.
beezone1.help_fragment_meditation_journey_inwards: Meditation is the journey inwards, a journey of self-discovery or, in fact, re-discovery. Meditation is time taken for quiet reflection and silence, away from the hustle and bustle of daily living. Taking time out enables us to come back to a centred place of being.
beezone1.help_fragment_meditation_state_of_being: Meditation is a state of being in that place just beyond every day consciousness, which is where spiritual empowerment begins. Spiritual awareness gives us the power to choose good and positive thoughts over those which are negative and wasteful. We start to respond to situations, rather than just reacting to them. We begin to live with harmony, we create better and happier, healthier relationships and change our lives in a most positive way. Raja Yoga teaches us to step back and observe life, take a calm breath, cool our reactions, and step forward in the way we choose - independent of others urging us to think or act as they wish.
beezone1.help_fragment_ry_meditation_explanation: Raja Yoga meditation is a form of meditation that is accessible to people of all backgrounds. It is a meditation without rituals or mantras and can be practised anywhere at any time. Raja Yoga meditation is practised with ‚Äòopen eyes\', which makes this method of meditation versatile, simple and easy to practice.
beezone1.help_fragment_ancient_meditation: This ancient meditation practice harnesses your natural powers and trains your mind to be your friend.
beezone1.help_fragment_meditation_spiritual_empow: Meditation is a state of being in that place just beyond every day consciousness, which is where spiritual empowerment begins. Spiritual awareness gives us the power to choose good and positive thoughts over those which are negative and wasteful. We start to respond to situations, rather than just reacting to them. We begin to live with harmony, we create better and happier, healthier relationships and change our lives in a most positive way.
beezone1.help_fragment_ry_step_back: Raja Yoga teaches us to step back and observe life, take a calm breath, cool our reactions, and step forward in the way we choose - independent of others urging us to think or act as they wish.
beezone1.help_fragment_anyone_can_benefit: Anyone and everyone who wants to can use, and benefit from, Raja Yoga meditation. Some choose to connect with a centre of meditation, like the Brahma Kumaris, others incorporate meditation into their daily lives and work with it themselves. It all works and it all enriches the lives of those who choose it.
beezone1.help_fragment_med_as_empowerment: Meditation is a state of being in that place just beyond every day consciousness, which is where spiritual empowerment begins. Spiritual awareness gives us the power to choose good and positive thoughts over those which are negative and wasteful. We start to respond to situations, rather than just reacting to them. We begin to live with harmony, we create better and happier, healthier relationships and change our lives in a most positive way.
beezone1.hemp_fragment_ry_observing_life: Raja Yoga teaches us to step back and observe life, take a calm breath, cool our reactions, and step forward in the way we choose - independent of others urging us to think or act as they wish.
beezone1.help_fragment_med_as_discipline: Like any discipline or form of art, it required one to invest time and energy to learn. It all depends on the individual and their commitment to practice.
beezone1.help_fragment_prod_development: This product has been developed by people who actively practice meditation in their lives and have taken a lot benefit from it. It has been distributed free of charge so that it is accessible to anyone who wish to explore meditation without a need to be able to afford it.
beezone1.help_fragment_connect_to_centre: It is suggested that if you would like to explore Raja Yoga Meditation further then you connect with a Brahma Kumaris centre in your locality. The list of locations can be found on their website at http://www.brahmakumaris.org/centre-locator
beezone1.help_fragment_meditate_at_any_time: You can meditate any time of the day but creating a habit of early morning meditation, before starting the day, is very beneficial as there are fewer distractions at that time and it allows you to ‚Äòset yourself up‚Äô for the day in a positive and empowering way.
beezone1.help_fragment_make_time: Like anything, you need to make time. It is so easy to convince the self that you have no time and so during the early stages of practice it is necessary to be disciplined. Once you start seeing the benefit you will naturally make time for it.
beezone1.help_fragment_meditate_anywhere: You can actually meditate anywhere but it is good to try and make a space in your home where you meditate each day. This will help create an energy and vibration which will, over time, naturally attract you into meditation.
beezone1.help_fragment_no_specific_rules: There are no specific rules on what to wear as this meditation works with the mind and not the body. However wearing something light and comfortable is good.
beezone1.help_fragment_no_specific_rules_long: Sit comfortably, but in an upright position. It can be on the floor or a chair. What is important is that the body is comfortable. Once you start meditating you don‚Äôt want to be distracted by for sitting position.
beezone1.traffic_control_fragment_tc_on_next_alar: Traffic Control turned on. Next alarm at: %02d:%02d
beezone1.traffic_control_fragment_chosen_period_i: The chosen period is not valid. Please make sure that the start time is before the end time
beezone1.traffic_control_segment_rescheduled: Traffic control re-scheduled and coming up next at %02d:%02d

virtueTexts.Tolerance: Diversity glorifies the garden of life. That's why you like different flowers in your bouquet of friends.
virtueTexts.Contentment: Just by writing a list of your achievements you realize that you have everything you need.
virtueTexts.Compassion: You perceive needs without judging and send out good wishes.
virtueTexts.Brotherhood: Because you know the father every human being has become your brother.
virtueTexts.Simplicity: You see the essentials in the charms of life and light your load by letting go of complications.
virtueTexts.Courage: You have won your greatest battle by agreeing to change
virtueTexts.Patience: Knowing the tiny seed contains the future tree you let your success grow in the soil of constancy
virtueTexts.Discipline: You obey the natural laws of the universe and receive in return protection, abundance and peace of mind
virtueTexts.Delicacy: You make magic wands of your thoughts and actions to turn vulgarity into subtlety
virtueTexts.Humility: You are a spiritual warrior who lays down the weapons of arrogance and resists to the pleasures of praise
virtueTexts.Spontaneity: Your spontaneity is like a gurgling brook which quenches all thirsts and lightens burdens
virtueTexts.Responsibility: Knowing your role is UNIQUE, you are the hero, not the spectator, in the drama of life
virtueTexts.Harmony: When you let go, you see how life dances
virtueTexts.Wisdom: You balance masterly depth and childlike lightness and learn something new in every situation
virtueTexts.Faith: You remove any doubt that blocks your path forward
virtueTexts.Friendship: You are your own best friend
virtueTexts.Happiness: You receive the little miracles of daily life as winks from the divine
virtueTexts.Self-confidence: You accept your good points with humility and simply dare to be great
virtueTexts.Detachment: You know that less expectations means less disappointment
virtueTexts.Enthusiasm: By listening to the child inside you, you give souls wings to fly
virtueTexts.Discernment: When in doubt, you know you can trust your instinct
virtueTexts.Purity: Your inner beauty shines in your eyes. Each one of our qualities is a facet of the diamond within
virtueTexts.Hope: You know each trial is like a friend that helps you grow stronger. That's why you always try again.
virtueTexts.Freedom: You look without judging. Listen without being influenced. Enjoy without greed
virtueTexts.Creativity: The foundation of creativity is inner peace
virtueTexts.Concentration: When the mind has become still and focused, then even thought that arises will hit the target without fail
virtueTexts.Strength: Connection with truth brings strength to the soul. The greater the truth the more powerful the strength.
virtueTexts.Serenity: The knowledge of the self is equivalent to truth which brings serenity and spiritual beauty
virtueTexts.Respect: The foundation of respect lies in the ability to accept another without judgement, irrespective of anything else
virtueTexts.Lightness: Be in the moment, without the burden of the past or the pressure of the future. This state of being is true lightness
virtueTexts.Honesty: Honesty is not just being natural, but giving to ourselves what is good and positive
virtueTexts.Generosity: The greatest act of generosity is to see beyond the weaknesses and mistakes of others
virtueTexts.Flexibility: The moment I renounce desire of ‚Äòwanting‚Äô, I become flexible internally and externally. I become free
virtueTexts.Economy: Economy means to have a focused mind that does not lose time with waste thoughts
virtueTexts.Determination: The moment I renounce desire of ‚Äòwanting‚Äô, I become flexible internally and externally. I become free

i18n.introText: Every day spin the wheel and enjoy the magic : keeping in mind that quality, see how it colours your thoughts, your environment, your world.

memory.initialMainMessage: Memorize the pattern that appears on the screen and tap when it disappears to play this game
memory.redrawPatternMessage: Please redraw the pattern by first selecting the colour and then the balls
memory.notRightPattern: That was not the right pattern.
